body.name: Charmin Ultra Soft Cushiony Touch Toilet Paper, 18 Family Mega Rolls = 90 Regular Rolls (Packaging May Vary)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 6 hrs 23 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: Rainforest Alliance seal stands for more sustainable farming methods that help improve farmer livelihoods & mitigate climate change. The Forest Stewardship Council certified products support responsible forestry, helping keep forests healthy for future generations.

features: For a limited time, shoppers may receive existing Charmin Ultra Soft Cushiony Touch product or NEW Charmin Ultra Soft Cushiony Touch with Smooth Tear product
Pack contains 18 Family Mega Plus Rolls (288 Sheets Per Roll) of Charmin Ultra Soft Cushiony Touch Toilet Paper
Trusted Softness, Better Tear vs. the leading USA 1-ply bargain brand
2X more absorbent so you can use less vs. the leading USA 1-ply bargain brand
1 Family Mega Roll = 5 Regular Rolls based on number of sheets in Charmin Regular Roll bath tissue
Holds up so your hands and behind keep clean while you go
body.description: Get irresistible cush for your tush with Charmin Ultra Soft Smooth Tear. Every roll is crafted with wavy perforations that tear better, for a smooth, more enjoyable go. And each sheet of toilet paper is 2X more absorbent so you can use less (vs. the leading USA 1-ply bargain brand). We made it FAMILY MEGA in size, so you get mega value. That’s right, our Charmin Ultra Soft Family Mega Roll equals 5 regular rolls (based on number of sheets in Charmin Regular Roll bath tissue), so you’ll be running back to the store less and less. Our Charmin Ultra Soft toilet paper is also 2-ply and designed to be clog-safe and septic-safe. We all go, why not Enjoy The Go with America’s favorite toilet paper. Charmin Brand based on sales. Source: Nielsen 2022 dollar sales.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This lasts a very long time .. worth the money… also very soft, thick… best on the market.
reviews.reviewText: I don’t have to be running out to the grocery store every week for toilet paper.This product is amazing and last a very long time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Charmin is the best!
reviews.reviewText: I never thought I would be writing a review for toilet paper. I never really thought about the design of toilet paper when tearing it off of a roll until I saw the wavy smooth tear. When I saw it, I had to try it.When I received the package, I was eager to try it out. I chuckled to myself for getting a little excited about a different way of tearing toilet paper.So far I have had perfect tears every time. No more unsightly uneven sheets. It seems no more wasting paper. The scalloped edge looks better than a straight tear hanging from the roll.Kudos to the design team at Procter and Gamble for making simple, simpler. It is nice to see someone come up with a novel idea without a list of instructions.I have used Charmin ever since I can remember, but I must admit that I have purchased other brands to save money. But I have always come back to Charmin.In my opinion, Charmin is the softest, strongest and most absorbent toilet paper on the market. I don't mind spending a little more money for the great feel it gives my skin.It's a good thing to want to treat yourself to the best. If you haven't used Charmin before, give it a try.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cloud-Like Comfort: Charmin Ultra Soft Cushiony Touch, The Throne's Best Friend
reviews.reviewText: Charmin Ultra Soft Cushiony Touch Toilet Paper, in its mega 18 Family Roll pack, is not just a household necessity; it's a luxurious upgrade to the daily routine. Earning a resplendent five-star rating, these rolls transform the mundane task of personal care into a pampering experience, proving that even the most basic items can be extraordinary.Each roll in this pack is like a soft, fluffy cloud, offering a touch so gentle and cushiony, it's almost like a tender hug for your skin. The Ultra Soft Cushiony Touch lives up to its name, providing a level of comfort that feels more spa-like than standard. It's the kind of toilet paper that turns a basic bathroom visit into a moment of indulgent self-care.But it's not just about the softness. The strength of Charmin's toilet paper is commendable, ensuring that it holds up during use while still being gentle. This balance of durability and delicacy is a testament to Charmin's commitment to quality, ensuring that practicality and luxury can coexist, even in a roll of toilet paper.The "Family Mega Roll" size is another aspect where Charmin shines. Each roll boasts a longevity that means fewer replacements and less hassle. It's like having a long-lasting reserve of comfort, ready to serve your family's needs without constant restocking. The claim of each roll being equivalent to 90 regular rolls isn't just impressive; it's a game-changer in convenience.Charmin Ultra Soft Cushiony Touch Toilet Paper does more than its intended purpose; it elevates an everyday item to a level of unexpected luxury. It's a reminder that even in the most routine aspects of life, there's room for a touch of comfort and quality.TL;DR: Charmin Ultra Soft Cushiony Touch Toilet Paper, in its 18 Family Mega Roll pack, is a luxurious, soft, and strong bathroom essential. Its large roll size offers convenience and longevity, earning a five-star rating for transforming the daily necessity of personal care into an experience of unmatched comfort.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best paper in the US since the Federalist Papers
reviews.reviewText: Soft, durable... I had not experienced this before.I have a lot of friends from abroad the US that come visit. They all agree that this toilet paper is incredible and unparalleled in other countries, no matter how much you are willing to pay. One of them, with a nasty case of hemorrhoids even took a couple of rolls back to their home country.It's funny, but it's true.The only possible downside I could think of that may apply to some households is the roll's size. Depending on how your toilet roll holder is designed: If it has a lid or it's too close to the wall, it may not fit. There's a reason they're called "Mega".

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best toliet paper hands down
reviews.reviewText: Honestly so soft, easily tears & worth every buck! Get something that you butt enjoys! Get charmin🤘🏻

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars One of the best brands of this product available.
reviews.reviewText: The price is better than at some places, though Costco has a much better deal. They sell larger packages for only $21. Enough to last my household an entire month. Unfortunately, I moved and haven't been able to find a Costco near here. Next choice with the best value is either here or Walmart. I opted for here because I have prime so I have free delivery. Only TP that is better than Charmin is Kirkland from Costco. Charmin is a close 2nd, though. Nice and soft, but strong enough to not tear or fall apart which means you can use less than how much you need to use for those cheaper brands. If you can't get to Costco for their Kirkland TP, then get Charmin from here. It's your next best value for the money.

reviews.reviewText: Love Charmin. Very soft, durable and great toilet paper.
